🍃🦋WE ALL KNEW YOU WERE INNOCENT OF DOMESTIC VIOLENCE. IN THE 40 YEARS OF ACTING AND 14 YEARS WITH YOUR WIFE VANESSA PARADIS AND YOUR TWO CHILDREN. THERE HAS NEVER BEEN ANY VIOLENCE, PHYSICAL ABUSE OR VIOLENT TEMPER WITH CO-STARS AND STAGE CREW.🦋🍃
🍃🦋NEVER GIVE UP A FIGHT YOU NEVER STARTED, BUT CONTINUE TO FIGHT FOR YOUR INNOCENCE.
QUITE FRANKLY, AND PROVEN, AMBER HEARD LIED TO THE COURT SYSTEM, LAWYERS, THE REAL VICTIMS AND LAPD FINEST. JOHNNY DEPP TOLD THE TRUTH.🦋🍃
🦋JUSTICE FOR JOHNNY DEPP🦋
